activities: We collect information from you when you register on the site, place an order, enter a contest or sweepstakes, respond to a survey or communication such as e-mail, or participate in another site feature. When ordering or registering, we may ask you for your name, e-mail address mailing address, phone number, credit card information or other information. You may however, visit our site anonymously. We also collect information about gift recipients so that we can fulfill the gift purchase.  The information we collect about gift recipients is not used for marketing purposes. Like many websites, we use “cookies” to enhance your experience and gather information about visitors and visitors to our websites.
